content: {"name": "The Salvation Army - Newark (Central)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Serves Newark and Irvington residents only\n- Call 9737928682 to make an appointment", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "699 Springfield Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "West Side", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07103", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7291752, "longitude": -74.2139821}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 623-5959", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must call during this time to register and book an appointment"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
